tool.name: loc2bkp
tool.displayname: Update Existing Backups of Track Points and Lines

param.name: web_pts
param.displayname: Source Track Points Feature Service Layer

param.name: loc_pts
param.displayname: Backup Track Points Feature Class (to update)
param.dialogReference: Backup points feature class or feature service, where new points will be appended.

param.name: lines
param.dialogReference: Backup track lines feature class or feature service, where new track lines will be appended.

param.name: break
param.dialogReference: Time duration in seconds used to define a break in continuous collection, used for assignment of track lines. When a time gap greater than this is encountered, it is considered the start of a new track line.

tool.summary: Compares a track points feature service layer to an existing track points feature class or feature service layer backup. Using a date created field to find rows not present in the backup, copies the new rows from the source to the backup. It then builds track lines for the new points, and appends the lines to the backup track lines layer (which can be a feature class or feature service layer).

idCitation.resTitle: Update Existing Backups of Track Points and Lines
